Preferences

Preferences are accessible from all activities by the settings icon displayed in the action bar for devices with android version from 3.0 or when the menu button is pressed for others. Preferences are persistent while the application is not uninstalled.

Connection

This section groups settings to register or connect a chest belt.

Register a new chest belt

To be able to access a new chest belt in the application, it has to be paired. By clicking on Pair a new device you can perform this with the default android way.

Connection mode

Because of the huge variety of Bluetooth implementation depending of devices, the connection could not always be established in the same mode on all devices. If the application is unable to connect to a chest belt, try to change this mode.

Chest belt
